author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ICF Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.78
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Icf International Inc:
* ICF REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.25 TO $3.45 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.78
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.41 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 10.9 PERCENT TO $321.2 MILLION * TOTAL BACKLOG WAS $2.05 BILLION AT END OF Q4 OF 2017 * SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUE OF $1.245 BILLION TO $1.285 BILLION
* SEES 2018 NON-GAAP DILUTED EPS SHOULD RANGE FROM $3.60 TO $3.80
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.78, REVENUE VIEW $306.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.38, REVENUE VIEW $1.26 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
